description: Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool. DISM is used to enumerate, install, uninstall, configure, and update features and packages in Windows images
name: Dism Remove Online Package
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\DismHost.exe AND process.parent.command_line.text:*\/Online* AND process.parent.command_line.text:*\/Disable\-Feature*) OR (process.executable.text:*\\Dism.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/Online* AND process.command_line.text:*\/Disable\-Feature*))
author: frack113
